tweet: The free @digg app is here for iPhone! They're giving out 1 custom iPad everyday for 2 weeks to celebrate! http://bit.ly/diggapp
I'm out.
Got to double up to stay competitive so got money in on QQ. Lost to AK when K hit.
Caught a J and doubled up.
Last hand before last break:  one pre flop raiser. I reraised. He pushed all in. I had pocket JJ. I called. He flipped over KK.
Got crippled down to 8k. Still getting second best hands. Got outplayed once in bog pot.
The Russian and I tangled for about three hours straight.
Them there is the Russian. He was dangerous but he lost a huge hand to the norweigan. He's almost out.
We have a guy who overslept and missed almost the entire first level.
Then there is the blond woman from Norway. She breathes heavy when she has a good hand.
There's a guy at the table who has only played 5 hands.
Got to reevaulate strategy and make sure I don't get trapped being so aggressive and wild.
But I didn't tilt at all and raised the next hand and continued playing. And that's worth something.
Funny thing was the other guy in hand who folded on the turn had ace-Jack. We pushed him out of the hand. And he was not a fish.
I was hoping I could push him off his hand. I figured he was on flush draw or had ace-six. He called and had ace-six.
Back to that hand. Long story short I had two pair and flush draw on turn. Bet 8k and one caller. Q on river bet another 10k
Big hand:  had 5-6s.  Flop.  A 6 J. Checked around, 3 players.
Blinds are 150/300
Took big couple hits. Lost almost 40k in two hands. Have 22k now.
Picked up a lot of premi hands bit not always good.
Stack running between 27 and 34k. About 31k now. 30k starting.
Lost a big pot with kk. Guy flopped quads. Lost another when trips hit and I was out kicked.
I have a wild image. Players are saying I have no idea what you have and then fail to value bet me.
Have a pro at my table. Don't know name but everyone taking pictures.
Going to take my seat. Quite a few people are nervous. Let's see if I can exploit that at the tables.
Whenever there was a pro all in or something happening they ran over to the table and started filming. They would run back and forth.
It was interesting to watch for a few minutes. Basically they had mobile crews with cameras walking through the majority of the tables.
Well it was Gus hansen. He was like a rock star. Women were falling over themselves to get next to him.
I was going by the ESOP before it started today and all of a sudden the hallway filled with people. Women were all excited and giggling.
Quite a few pros playing on day one too.
Day one leaders include jasson Alexander in 6th place with 84,500 in chips. That's George from Seinfeld. Eli eleezra is in 7th.
Pokerstars has given me six shirts, six hats, a zip up fleece, stick on logos to wear on shirts and a duffel bag. Why did I bring clothes?
I'm playing in a live sit n go for pokerstars today. It's a six person game. First gets 500, 2nd gets 300 and everyone else gets 100.
The palms where I am staying is pokerstars headquarters. Stars basically took over it.
I'll be playing on July 4th. Table 64 seat 1.
@FoldTheNuts thanks
@FoldTheNuts it's one big line. Just like heritage poker.
I'll be playing on the 4th of July. Table 64 seat 1.
Only took an hour.
Okay. Just handed over 10k and got 2 pieces of paper. Seemed like a good thing to do at the time.
You wouldn't believe how many people are paying cash or casino chips.
In line to register and it's looks like a 20 something testosterone fest.
I'm bought in for a total of $99 ($66 for double rebuy at the beginning of the tourney & another $33 for an add-on at the end of rebuys).
All for winning a $33 rebuy tourney.
VIP Invitation July 9 PokerStars Player Party
8 nights hotel accommodation at the Palms, plus extra nights after July 10 if still in the tournamentPokerStars player bag
$10,000 Main Event buy-in$1,000 for travel and expenses

Well, I won a free ride to the 2009 Main Event from Pokerstars.  I'll update this with my progress as I go along.
